name: Lonely Planet (shieldgenerator7)
description:
This lonely planet wants all the moons. But it has to get big enough to get all of them.

== Controls ==
WASD, Arrow Keys, Mouse, Touch

== Gameplay ==
Moons give you score multipliers.
Asteroids increase your score, range, and gravity.

Don't let asteroids attach to you outside your range!

== Credits ==
